boat.full_description:
Built in 1981, this is a nice example of the original Cornish Crabber 24 which has been in her previous ownership for almost 20 years. Previously she was based in Lyme Regis and lately in North Norfolk. Her new owner bought her in 2023 will base her on the Helford from 2024.

She has a grp hull with a sheathed plywood deck and cockpit. She is finished with high quality mahogany trim which has all be varnished. 

She has a Yanmar 1GM10 diesel engine, which was fitted in 2015 along with all the propeller shaft and stern gear also being replaced.
boat.name: Hanky Panky
